00014 #ifndef AR_H_
00015 #define AR_H_
00016 
00017 #include "spectrumsolver.h"
00018 
00019 //! Base class for YuleWalker AR and Burg's MEM.
00020 //! The object holds a list of \a Context in order to search for the minimum of the information criteria.
00021 //! \sa YuleWalkerAR, BurgMEM
00022 template <class Context>
00023 class YuleWalkerCousin : public SpectrumSolver {
00024 public:
00025     YuleWalkerCousin(tfuncIC ic);
00026     virtual ~YuleWalkerCousin() {}
00027 protected:
00028     virtual void genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00029         int t0, double tol, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength);
00030 
00031     //! Infomation Criterion for AR.
00032     double arIC(double sigma2, int p, int t) {
00033         return m_funcARIC(-0.5 * t * log(sigma2), p + 1, t);
00034     }
00035     
00036     virtual void first(
00037         const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, const shared_ptr<Context> &context) = 0;
00038     //! Steps Levinson recursion.
00039     virtual void step(const shared_ptr<Context> &context) = 0;
00040     std::deque<shared_ptr<Context> > m_contexts;
00041 private:
00042     const tfuncIC m_funcARIC;
00043 };
00044 
00045 struct ARContext {
00046     ARContext() {}
00047     ARContext(const ARContext &c) : a(c.a), sigma2(c.sigma2), p(c.p), t(c.t) {}
00048     std::vector<std::complex<double> > a;
00049     double sigma2;
00050     unsigned int p;
00051     unsigned int t;
00052 };
00053 struct MEMBurgContext : public ARContext {
00054     MEMBurgContext() : ARContext() {}
00055     MEMBurgContext(const MEMBurgContext &c) : ARContext(c), eta(c.eta), epsilon(c.epsilon) {}
00056     std::vector<std::complex<double> > eta, epsilon;
00057 };
00058 
00059 //! Burg's MEM (Maximum Entropy Method).
00060 //! \sa YuleWalkerAR
00061 class MEMBurg : public YuleWalkerCousin<MEMBurgContext> {
00062 public:
00063     MEMBurg(tfuncIC ic = &icAICc) : YuleWalkerCousin<MEMBurgContext>(ic) {}
00064     virtual ~MEMBurg() {}
00065 protected:
00066     virtual void first(
00067         const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, const shared_ptr<MEMBurgContext> &context);
00068     virtual void step(const shared_ptr<MEMBurgContext> &context);
00069 private:
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 //! Yule-Walker AR (Auto-Regressive model) by Levinson-Durbin algorithm.
00074 //! \sa MEMBurg
00075 class YuleWalkerAR : public YuleWalkerCousin<ARContext> {
00076 public:
00077     YuleWalkerAR(tfuncIC ic = &icAICc) : YuleWalkerCousin<ARContext>(ic) {}
00078     virtual ~YuleWalkerAR() {}
00079 protected:
00080     virtual void first(
00081         const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin, const shared_ptr<ARContext> &context);
00082     virtual void step(const shared_ptr<ARContext> &context);
00083 private:
00084     //! Auto-regression.
00085     std::vector<std::complex<double> > m_rx;
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif /*AR_H_*/
